ampvis2
  • Get Started
  • Reference

Tools for visualising amplicon data

ampvis2 is an R-package to visualise amplicon data. more more more

Installing ampvis2

First, install R (and for Windows also RTools) and RStudio. Then open RStudio as administrator (!) and run the 2 commands below to install ampvis2 from the console. If you get asked to update old packages, just hit a. Install missing packages with biocLite("packagename"), if any.

source("http://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite("MadsAlbertsen/ampvis2", ref = "devel", dependencies = TRUE)

Shiny

An interactive Shiny app with some of the basic functionality of ampvis2 can be found at: https://kasperskytte.shinyapps.io/shinyampvis

Get started

For a quick guide on how to use ampvis2 go to Get started and for details about all ampvis2 functions go to Reference.
